rationale: The documentation did not mention the patient's response to losartan or the absence of cough.
The documentation did not note the patient's mild dizziness upon standing.
There was no structured assessment of the patient's blood pressure control.
The documentation did not confirm the patient's adherence to the medication regimen or the timing of losartan intake.
There was no documentation of a follow-up plan or instructions for monitoring dizziness or other side effects.
